bibl.title: Ancient Christian Magic. Coptic Texts of Ritual Power.
bibl.note: Presents in English translation a selection of 135 Greek and Coptic magical texts from about 100 C.E. to around the XIth or XIIth century.
bibl.seg: MEYER Marvin, Richard SMITH and Neal KELSEY (Edd.), Ancient Christian Magic. Coptic Texts of Ritual Power.
San Francisco, Harper, 1994, 8Â°, xiii-407 pp., figg. et pll. ISBN 0-06-065578-X (hbk) / 0-06-065584-4 (pbk).
Presents in English translation a selection of 135 Greek and Coptic magical texts from about 100 C.E. to around the XIth or XIIth century.
